name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Angular Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind**, with a strong focus on **Responsive Design** and **Mobile Compatibility**. Demonstrated ability to optimize performance and debug complex systems to ensure seamless user experiences.
Skilled in Agile methodologies and Scrum practices, fostering collaboration within cross-functional teams to drive project success. Experienced in full-stack development using **JavaScript**, **Python**, **React**, and **Node.js**, along with CI/CD pipelines and cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**. Adept at compliance-driven development, maintaining alignment with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards, and specializing in AI/ML-powered platforms with a solid foundation in MLOps using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
